info.+content: The "Polar Bear Cafe" is run by a polar bear, and serves both humans and animals daily.
#1: "Boku ni Invitation" (ボクにインビテーション; My Invitation) by JP (eps 1-26)
#3: "You & Me" by Saki and Rie Fu (eps 39-50)
#4: "ZOO tto, Ne♪ (ZOOっと、ね♪; Forever, Right♪)" by Katsuyuki Konishi (eps 14-17,44)
#5: "Michinoku Shiiku Blues (みちのく飼育ブルース;Michinoku Zookeeper Blues)" by Wataru Hatano (eps 18-22)
#6: "Zokkon! Penko-san (ぞっこん！ペン子さん; With All My Heart! Penko-san)" by Hiroshi Kamiya (eps 23-26)
#7: "Kimama ni Panda Mama♥ (気ままに パンダママ♥; Selfish Panda Mama)" by Toshiyuki Morikawa (eps 27-30)
#8: "Llama-san no Llama Mambo (ラマさんのラママンボ; Mr. Llama's Llama Mambo)" by Daisuke Ono (eps 31-35)
#10: "Bamboo Rendezvous" (バンブー・ランデヴー♥) by Kana Hanazawa (eps 39-42)
